Description: Steatite cowroid: engraved on the base, Horus wearing an elaborate Atef crown, sits on a lotus flower with a heavy stalk. One hand is raised to his mouth. A palm branch on either side.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Rev Greville John Chester
Bibliographic references: Giveon R 1985a / Egyptian scarabs from Western Asia from the collections of the British Museum (p.148 no.34)
